title: Hospital Furniture
alt: Hospital beds, tables, and patient chairs
description: A wide range of furniture for hospitals, clinics, and healthcare facilities, ensuring patient comfort and staff efficiency.

title: Medical Surgical Disposables
alt: Disposable gloves, masks, and syringes
description: Essential single-use medical and surgical supplies for infection control and various procedures.

title: Diagnostic Kits and Chemicals
alt: Diagnostic test kits and laboratory chemicals
description: Comprehensive range of diagnostic kits and chemical reagents for accurate testing and analysis.

title: Laboratory Equipments
alt: Microscopes, centrifuges, and lab instruments
description: Advanced equipment for scientific research, analysis, and educational laboratories.

title: Hospital Linens
alt: Bed sheets, blankets, and patient gowns
description: High-quality, durable linens designed for comfort and hygiene in hospital environments.

title: Dental Equipments and Materials
alt: Dental chairs, drills, and filling materials
description: Specialized equipment and materials for dental practices, orthodontics, and oral surgery.

title: OT and ICU Equipments
alt: Operating theater lights, ventilators, and patient monitors
description: Critical equipment for operating theaters and intensive care units, ensuring patient safety and support.

title: Physiotherapy Equipments
alt: Therapy machines, exercise bikes, and rehabilitation tools
description: Tools and machines used for physical therapy, rehabilitation, and injury recovery.

title: Rehabilitation Products and Prosthetics
alt: Wheelchairs, crutches, and prosthetic limbs
description: Aids and devices to assist in rehabilitation and provide mobility solutions for individuals with disabilities.

title: Miscellaneous Products
alt: Various medical and healthcare-related items
description: A collection of diverse medical products that don't fit into other specific categories.

title: Trauma and Emergency Products
alt: First aid kits, stretchers, and emergency response tools
description: Essential products for trauma care, emergency response, and first aid situations.

title: Infant Care and NICU Equipments
alt: Incubators, infant warmers, and neonatal monitors
description: Specialized equipment for newborn care, premature infants, and neonatal intensive care units.

title: Hospital Ware S.S.
alt: Stainless steel bowls, trays, and containers for hospitals
description: Durable stainless steel ware for medical, surgical, and general hospital use.

title: Medical Rubber and Silicon Products
alt: Rubber tubing, silicone masks, and medical gaskets
description: Flexible and sterile products made from medical-grade rubber and silicon for various applications.

title: OB GYN Products
alt: Gynecological instruments, obstetric beds, and maternity supplies
description: Specialized products and equipment for obstetrics and gynecology practices.

title: Sports Compressions
alt: Compression socks, sleeves, and wraps for sports
description: Compression wear designed to support muscles, improve circulation, and aid recovery in sports.

title: Scientific and Lab Equipments
alt: Research instruments, laboratory apparatus, and analytical tools
description: A broad range of equipment for scientific research, experiments, and laboratory analysis.

title: X-Ray and Radiology Equipments
alt: X-ray machines, MRI scanners, and imaging devices
description: Advanced equipment for diagnostic imaging, including X-ray, MRI, and CT scan machines.

title: Pathology and Lab Equipments
alt: Microscopes, centrifuges, and pathology analyzers
description: Tools and instruments specifically for pathology labs, aiding in disease diagnosis and research.

title: Home Care Products
alt: Mobility aids, daily living aids, and home medical devices
description: Products designed for patient care and assistance in a home environment.

title: Modulators and Central Pipeline
alt: Medical gas pipeline systems and control units
description: Systems and components for central medical gas supply and modulation within healthcare facilities.

title: Surgical Instruments
alt: Forceps, scalpels, retractors, and surgical scissors
description: Precision-engineered instruments for all types of surgical procedures.

title: Eye ENT Instruments and Equipments
alt: Ophthalmoscopes, otoscopes, and ENT examination tools
description: Specialized instruments and equipment for ophthalmology and ear, nose, and throat (ENT) procedures.

title: Neuro, Nephro, Gastro, Endoscopes
alt: Endoscopes for neurological, nephrological, and gastroenterological procedures
description: Advanced endoscopes and related equipment for specialized diagnostic and therapeutic procedures in neurology, nephrology, and gastroenterology.

title: Neuro and Cardiac Inst. and Eqip.
alt: Neurological and cardiac surgical instruments and equipment
category: Neuro and Cardiac Inst. and Eqip.
description: Specialized instruments and equipment for neurological and cardiac surgeries and interventions.

title: Orthopedic Equip., Implants and Inst.
alt: Orthopedic implants, surgical instruments, and rehabilitation equipment
description: A comprehensive range of orthopedic equipment, implants, and instruments for bone and joint care.

title: ICU Ambulance and Equip.
alt: Ambulances with ICU facilities and critical care equipment
description: Fully equipped ambulances with intensive care unit capabilities and emergency medical equipment.

title: Hospital Hygiene, Sanitation, Septic and Cleaning Equip and Accesories
alt: Cleaning machines, sanitizers, and waste disposal units
category: Hospital Hygiene, Sanitation, Septic and Cleaning Equip and Accesories
description: Products and equipment for maintaining hygiene, sanitation, and effective waste management in hospitals.
